name: scrape
description: Execute a web scrape using ScraperAPI with the specified parameters

arguments.name: render
arguments.desc: Whether to render the page using JavaScript. Set to `True` only if the page requires JavaScript rendering to display its content

arguments.name: ultra_premium
arguments.desc: Whether to use ultra premium scraping

arguments.name: device_type
arguments.desc: Device type to scrape from. Set request to use `mobile` or `desktop` user agents

arguments.name: autoparse
arguments.desc: Enable automatic parsing of the content for select websites
